name: @cage/root

scripts.preinstall: node -e "const v=process.version; const req='v22.20.0'; if(v!==req) throw new Error('Node '+req+' required. Run: nvm use')"
scripts.prebuild: node -e "const v=process.version; const req='v22.20.0'; if(v!==req) throw new Error('Node '+req+' required. Run: nvm use')"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace @cage/shared && npm run build --workspaces --if-present
scripts.check: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.publish:cli: npm run build && cd packages/cli && npm publish
scripts.publish:dry-run: npm run build && cd packages/cli && npm publish --dry-run

author: Software Engineering & Consulting Pty Ltd
description: A controlled environment for AI that provides the right boundaries, context, and guidance
